meanings.definition: The quality of being magnificent or splendid.
meanings.sent1: The magnificence of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The palace was filled with magnificence and grandeur.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be a queen, reveling in the magnificence of her cardboard crown.
meanings.sent4: The magnificence of the mountain peak against the clear blue sky was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The magnificence of the fireworks display left the crowd in awe.

meanings.definition: A splendid or impressive quality or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The magnificence of the diamond ring caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The magnificence of the waterfall was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick had an unexpected magnificence that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The magnificence of the old castle whispered tales of bygone eras.
meanings.sent5: The magnificence of the peacock's feathers shimmered in the sunlight.
